div.p: When we have gathered all the information that we think we need then the study will be locked to prevent any further changes so that we know we are working with a stable set of data.
The status gives you an idea of how we are progressing with processing your study.
If you click this button then an email will be automatically sent to WWARN to inform us that you've finished making changes.
This gives you the chance to control how your study will be shown on the WWARN Explorer. Either in full with the summarized data, just a summary of the study or not at all.
